metadata.synopsis: A player left a Netherstone on the ground inside the Steel Watch Foundry before they blew it up.The player spots the looters who have the Netherstones and must chase after them. Once they get the stones back, the Emperor expresses relief and a bit of frustration.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Load CTY_Main_AGo to steel watch foundryGet at least one stone through the debug book (Emperor Prelude)Drop at least one inside the steel watch foundry buildingSetGlobalOsirisFlag IRN_IronThrone_State_DestroyedWalk to the Looters (should see Netherstone icons on map)Kill themLoot the stones

0.speaker: GROUP_Emperors
0.text: To think the world could have ended thanks to a pack of scavenging kobolds. If your fingers are so slippery, leave the Netherstones in your camp.
